alert.note: Alert for Douglas; Ozark (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 15 at 4:50PM CDT until April 15 at 5:30PM CDT by NWS Springfield
info.description: The National Weather Service in Springfield has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Ozark County in southwestern Missouri... South central Douglas County in southwestern Missouri... * Until 530 PM CDT. * At 450 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 11 miles north of Price Place, or 19 miles north of Bull Shoals, moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Ping pong ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Bryant Creek State Park, Wasola, Thornfield, Noble, Squires, Willhoit and Gentryville. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.50 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
